overview: Do√±a Flor didn't anticipate having to deal with such an unruly crew when she inherited her fathers small Mexican eatery. The cook's a drunk, the waitresses are lazy, the busboy is overly amorous, and there's a pimp operating on the premises. But the tables begin to turn for Flor when her employees decide the she would learn to relax if they could only find her a man.
tagline: Something is cooking... and it's not on the menu!
title: La taqueria
